He looks forward to serving his community members by providing an easy way for them to transfer their monies from one location to another.

Jones has requested a Kiva loan to help start his business operations. Namely, he will purchase a Zoona-branded trading booth, a portable storefront, that costs approximately $1,300 USD. He plans to employ one teller to help him with the day-to-day running of the booth.

Jones is grateful for the opportunity to raise his start-up funds through Kiva and the huge potential this loan will provide in accomplishing this goal. He would like to thank all the Kiva lenders for their support of entrepreneurs who, like himself, need financing.

loans.use: To purchase a Zoona-branded portable storefront which he will use to serve customers

loans.name: Cristian Ricardo

texts.es:
Cristian es un joven emprendedor, tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Palpa junto a su familia.
Actualmente estudia la carrera de Producción Agropecuaria porque quiere convertirse en un excelente profesional para orgullo de su familia. También, desde hace 2 años trabaja brindando servicios de transporte a través de toda la ciudad con una mototaxi que tiene. Le va muy bien porque es muy trabajador, responsable, siempre se preocupa por el bienestar de sus pasajeros y respeta las normas de tránsito.
Cristian está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá empezar con los trámites para obtener su tarjeta de propiedad, permisos requeridos, pago de SOAT. De esta manera podrá continuar laborando sin ningún inconveniente y se esforzará al máximo para poder sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Cristian is a young entrepreneur. He is 21 years old, single, and lives with his family in Palpa.

Cristian is currently studying for a degree in Agricultural Production because he wants to become a successful professional who can make his family proud. In addition, he has been working the past two years by providing transportation services throughout the city with a motorcycle taxi that he owns. He is doing very well because he is hardworking, responsible, and always concerned about the well-being of his passengers. Cristian also obeys the traffic rules.

He is grateful to the Kiva lenders because of the support they have offered. Cristian will be able to begin filing the paperwork needed to obtain his vehicle registration card, the required permits, as well as pay for mandatory accident insurance. This will enable him to continue working without any problems. Cristian strives to do his best so that his family can get ahead.

loans.use: to file the paperwork needed to obtain his vehicle registration card, the required permits, as well as pay for mandatory accident insurance.

loans.name: Pancha

texts.en:
Pancha is a 33-year-old lady. She has two children (one son and one daughter).  Both of them are in different grades of secondary school. She, along with her family, lives in a remote region in Jalpaiguri district.  Pancha is uneducated and can only sign her name although her husband studied up to ninth standard.

Pancha's husband Dhananjay, age 53, is engaged in a small business. Pancha, though a housewife, is energetic and optimistic.  She has investigated how she can give financial assistance to her family, after managing her household.  She has come to the conclusion that she will start a business selling bay leaves (aromatic leaves of a plant used in cooking), which is in high demand in the market, as it is widely used in several dishes for its aroma. She started her business a few years ago, to give additional financial support to her family. She purchases green bay leaves from the farmers, dries and processes them and then she packs them. She sells them to the market and in her neighborhood. 

Now she wants to extend her business to satisfy her customers and to generate more income from her business. For that reason, she needs some capital. Pancha has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to buy agricultural supplies to expand her bay leaf business.  With the help of the loan, she will buy more raw green leaves for her business. She wants to go ahead with the business to strengthen the family economy and give their children a good upbringing.

She thanks both BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase raw green bay leaves for her business.

loans.name: Santwana

texts.en:
Santwana is 34 years old. She studied up to grade 11. She wanted to go for higher studies but it was too difficult because of her parents' economic situation.  She is married now.  Her husband Dinesh, age 45, is engaged in agricultural activities. She is the mother of two daughters, one of whom is in school.  The younger daughter is not in school yet. They live in a remote region in Jalpaiguri district.

Her husband has an agricultural farm where he grows different vegetables in different seasons.  He is visionary and focused.  He has been in this business for the last 10 years.  He struggles hard to grow good quality vegetables to satisfy his customers. But his earning are not as much as he expects.  His land is very fertile and productive.  So he has decided to cultivate tea plants on the farmland. The main obstacle is capital.

Santwana is also a very hardworking and enterprising lady.  Though she is a housewife, she helps her husband a lot in his work.  Now she is seeking a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase agricultural supplies such as tea saplings, manure etc. She hopes the business will be a lucrative one as it is in very good demand in the market. So they have chosen this crop to cultivate.

Her goals are to strengthen their family business and economy and provide a better education to her daughters in renowned schools.

She thanks her lenders for helping her by giving her the loan.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies to cultivate tea plants.

loans.name: Marcia Ilia

texts.es: Marcia es una señora trabajadora que en las mañanas se dedica a la elaboración de sacos de lana, al medio día trabaja de empleada domestica,  arreglando una casa y en las tardes vende alitas asadas, chorizo y de mas comidas rápidas,  Marcia está separada de su esposo, ella se hace cargo de sus 3 hijos de los que el de 14 años asiste al colegio, la de 10 años asiste a la escuela y la de 3 años aun no está estudiando, Marcia tiene 36 años de edad y el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de lana para tejer y luego vender los sacos que los hace con mucho amor, Marcia espera mejorar su negocio y seguir trabajando duro para sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos.
texts.en:
Marcia is a hard-working woman who in the mornings works at making wool bags. At noon she works as a domestic employee cleaning a house and in the evenings she sells fried chicken wings, chorizo (sausage) and other fast foods.

Marcia is separated from her husband and she takes care of three children. The 14 year old goes to Middle school, the 10 year old to primary school and the youngest, 3 years old does not yet go to school. Marcia is 36 years old.

The loan will be invested in buying wool to knit and then she will sell the bags that she makes with a lot of love. Marcia hopes to improve her business and continue to work hard to bring up her 3 children.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to assist in growing crops.

loans.name: Kotognogontala 1 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe KOTOGNOGONTALA1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 36 ans, ont en moyenne 5 enfants et vivant la plupart dans des familles traditionnelles à KOROBARRAGE un village dans la commune de KOUORO dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du MALI.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur quatrième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide avec madame KADIATOU débout à la deuxième position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme  KOTOGNOGONTALA 1. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter 5 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 3 bidons d’herbicide, payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  0,75 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, à SIKASSO  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes au comptant et à crédit.
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 100 000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et son intérêt, aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the KOTOGNOGONTALA 1 group are married women and they are, on average, 36 years old with five children each. Most of them live in traditional families in Korobarrage, a village located in the commune of Kouoro, Cercle of Sikasso (third administrative region of Mali). They work with Kiva's partner, the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso, in order to successfully carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. They are on their fourth farming loan with the institution, and they have duly repaid their previous loans.

Kadiatou, a member of the group, grows groundnut. In the photo, she is in the standing row, second from the right. She is planning to use her loan to buy five 50-kilo bags of fertilizers, three cans of herbicide, and to cover the cost of plowing on 0.75 hectare of land. After the harvest, she sells her crops in her village and in Sikasso. Her customers are both men and women and they pay her in cash or on credit. She is expecting to make an average profit of 100,000 CFA francs per planting season. Kadiatou will use her profit to repay her loan and the interest, and to help her husband with the day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and herbicides, and to cover plowing costs.

loans.name: Zoila Maria

texts.es: Zoila  tiene 71 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de sabanas, edredones, cobijas y entre otros productos, su esposo se dedica al trabajo de radiotécnico en un pequeño local que puso en su casa, Zoila vive con su esposo y con 2 de sus 6 hijos, una de las chicas que vive con Zoila es soltera y tiene un hijo que asiste al colegio y la otra de sus hijas está estudiando en la universidad, con el dinero del crédito Zoila va a comprar mercadería en cobijas para ofrecerlas en su localidad de manera ambulante, lo que ella aspira es seguir adelante en su negocio y lograr cubrir los gastos de de estudio de su hija.
texts.en: Zoila is 71 years old. She sells sheets, quilts, blankets and other products. Her husband works as a radio technician in a small business that he opened in their home. Zoila lives with her husband and 2 of their 6 children. One of the girls who lives with Zoila is single and has a child that attends school, and the other daughter who lives with them is studying in the university. With the loan Zoila is going to buy blankets to sell in her area as a street vendor. She hopes to continue with her business and be able to cover her daughter's school expenses.

loans.use: to buy blankets.

loans.name: Waldir

texts.es:
Waldir es un joven emprendedor, tiene 44 años de edad, es soltero y vive en San Martin junto a su familia.
Desde hace más de 5 años trabaja como personal de Seguridad en un prestigioso Banco, le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, trabajador, honesto y porque siempre se preocupa por el bienestar de las personas. Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante y quiere darle lo mejor a su familia.
Waldir está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar una cama y un colchón para que pueda dormir con mayor comodidad y se despierte cada día con las mismas ganas de trabajara para salir adelante y más adelante poder formar su propio negocio y trabajar de manera independiente.
texts.en:
Waldir is a young entrepreneur, 44 years old, single and lives in San Martin with his family. He has worked as a security guard for more than 5 years at a prestigious bank. His work is going well because he is very responsible, hard-working, honest and he is always concerned for the well-being of others. He is a person with a great desire to be successful and wants to give his family the best.

Waldir is very thankful to the Kiva lenders because with the support they have provided he will be able to buy a bed and mattress so that he can sleep comfortably and wake up every day with the same desire to work to get ahead and in the future be able to start his own business and work for himself.

loans.use: to buy a bed and mattress.

loans.name: Andres De Jesus

texts.es:
Andrés de 33 años de edad, estudió hasta 4º grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos,  tiene dos hijos de los cuales solo uno estudia y el otro no porque es recién nacido.
 
  
Andrés se dedica al cultivo de maíz y tiene una amplia experiencia en este rubro porque lo aprendió desde que tenía 8 años cuando trabajaba junto al papá, la distancia de su trabajo es de 20 minutos a pie.

El crédito lo necesita para pagar el alquiler de la tierra que va a cultivar, además comprará 6 sacos de abono y veneno para la maleza. 

Su sueño es tener  una casa digna para su familia, espera lograrlo trabajando fuerte y sacando créditos para lograrlo y espera que esta institución lo apoye.
texts.en:
Andrés is 33 years old. He went to school through 4th grade. He is married and his partner does the domestic work. He has two children, of whom only one is in school, and the other is not because he was born recently.

Andrés raises corn, and he has plenty of experience in this work because he began learning it when he was 8 years old when he worked alongside his father. The distance to his work is 20 minutes on foot.

He needs the loan to pay the rent for the land that he is going to cultivate. In addition, he will buy six sacks of compost and poison for the weeds.

His dream is to have a worthy house for his family. He hopes to manage this by working hard and taking out loans to achieve this, and he hopes that this institution will support him.

loans.use: to pay the rent for the land that he is going to cultivate, and to buy 6 sacks of compost and poison for the weeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start a chicken farm, buy 200 chickens and feed and vitamins for them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate, rafters and purlins to replace the roof of his house.

loans.name: Lina Aurelia

texts.es:
Lina es una mujer trabajadora, tiene 67 años de edad, es viuda y vive en San Martin con uno de sus hijos.
Desde hace 4 años es viuda, por lo que pese al dolor tuvo que hacerse cargo del negocio familiar. Desde hace muchos años se dedica a la agricultura, dedicándose principalmente al cultivo de cacao. También se dedica a la venta de bebidas típicas como el Chuchuhuasi, Indanachado, 7 raíces, entre otros. Le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, trabajadora, y siempre se esfuerza por brindar productos de calidad a los clientes.
Lina está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar insumos como fertilizantes para poder realizar el abonamiento de sus cultivos y podrá hacer el mantenimiento respectivo. De esta manera obtendrá productos de mejor calidad y más ganancias. Gracias a esto seguirá trabajando con  mucho esfuerzo para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Lina is a hard-working woman. She is 67 years old. She is a widow and lives in San Martin with one of her children.

She has been a widow for 4 years. That is why, in spite of her grief, she had to take charge of the family business. She has worked in agriculture for many years, principally growing cacao. She also sells traditional beverages such as Chuchuhuasi, Indanachado, and Seven Roots, among others. It is going very well for her because she is very responsible and hard-working, and she always makes an effort to offer quality products to her customers.

Lina is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support that they have offered her, she will be able to buy supplies such as fertilizers to be able to fertilize her crops, and she will be able to do the respective maintenance. In this way she will obtain products of better quality and more earnings. Thanks to this, she will continue working with great effort to improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies (fertilizers) to fertilize her crops.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
A sus 68 años de edad Gustavo como única entrada de dinero tiene su microempresa de acarreos el cual lo hace con la ayuda de un caballo y un pequeño coche que el mismo construyo, la actividad la aprendió empíricamente y la ejerció debido a que en sus tiempos las oportunidades de trabajo eran mínimas y de alguna manera debía llevar el pan a su hogar. 
Su medio de trabajo le ha brindado una gran ayuda económica a través del tiempo, pero los tiempos cambia y es por esto que quiere solicitar un crédito para mejorar su coche y hacerlo más liviano  mejor visto para el público de esta manera beneficiara al caballo y tendrá satisfechos a los usuarios.
Este crédito será de gran importancia pues le dará gusto a los requerimientos de sus usuarios de mejorar el aspecto del coche
texts.en:
At 68 years old, Gustavo's only source of income is his small transportation business. He does it with the help of a horse and a small vehicle that he build himself.

He learned this job empirically, and he does it because in his day, job opportunities were minimal and he had to bring home the bread somehow.

His field of work has been a huge economic help over time, but times change. This is why he wants to seek a loan to improve his vehicle and make it more lightweight and better appearing for the public. In this way, he will benefit the horse and have satisfied users.

This loan will be very important, as improving the appearance of the vehicle will bring happiness to the needs of his users.

loans.use: to adjust his vehicle to make it lighter.

loans.name: Teodoberto

texts.es:
Teodoberto es un hombre muy trabajador, tiene 47 años de edad, vive en Yarinacocha junto a su familia.
Tiene dos hijos que son su mayor orgullo y por quienes lucha día a día para poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Desde hace más de 10 años se dedica a la agricultura, el principal producto cultivado es el caco, y le va muy bien puesto que es una persona muy luchadora, responsable, emprendedor, y sobre todo porque siempre ofrece productos de calidad a un precio accesible.
Teodoberto está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar insumos para realizar el mantenimiento de sus cultivos como fertilizantes, también pagará por el mantenimiento hasta la etapa de la cosecha, con esto sus productos ofrecidos serán de mejor calidad y seguirá esforzándose para brindar una educación de calidad a sus hijos y poder cumplir su más grande sueño más adelante: "Ver a sus hijos con una carrera universitaria".
texts.en:
Teodoberto is a very hard-working man. He is 47 years old. He lives in Yarinacocha with his family.

He has two children who are his greatest pride and for whom he strives day after day to be able to offer them a better quality of life. He has worked in agriculture for more than 10 years. The principal product he cultivates is cacao, and it is going very well for him, since he is a very hard-working person, responsible and entrepreneurial, and above all because he always offers quality products at an affordable price.

Teodoberto is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the help that they have offered him, he will be able to buy supplies, such as fertilizers, for the maintenance of his crops. He will also pay for the maintenance up to the time of the harvest. With this, the products he offers will be of better quality and he will continue to work hard to offer a quality education to his children and to be able to accomplish his greatest dream for the future: to see his children with a university degree.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to care for her plants and her coffee nursery during this new season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, a generator and fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, a sewing machine and an embroidery machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an over lock sewing machine, fabric, and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, embroidery machine and table.

loans.name: Yilkia

texts.es: Yilkia de 25 años posee una tienda naturista, lugar donde ofrece servicios de terapia y  vende productos como soya, salsas, mentoles para dolores musculares, expectorantes, digestivos etc.  Su actividad generadora de ingresos, inició desde  hace 9 años, cuando decidió prestar un servicio complementario al que realiza su padre de medicina botánica. Yilka permanentemente promociona sus productos mediante el volanteo puerta a puerta y el buen servicio que ofrece a su clientela. Sus principales clientes pertenecen a su propia vecindad y para ellos trabaja desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, comprando de contado a proveedores que le ofrecen lo que su clientela requiere.  Su meta consiste en expandir sus ventas y sus servicios a otros barrios y abordar parte de la ciudad de Barranquilla que se encuentra muy cerca al lugar donde habita y tiene su negocio. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva mediante el cual comprará medicina natural, polen, propolio, salsas, mentol, soya etc. Porque Yilkia tiene como metas generar mas ingresos para ayudar mucho mas a su familia,
texts.en:
Yilkia is 25 years old and has natural product store where she offers therapeutic services and sells products like soya, sauces, menthol for muscular pain, expectorant, digestives, etc. It generates her income. She started her business 9 years ago when she decided to offer a complimentary service to her father's botanical medicine.

Yilkia constantly promotes her product by fliers left door-to-door and the good service she offers her clients. Her main clients reside in her neighborhood and she works from 8 in the morning until 6 at night. She buys in cash from distributors that provide what her clients request. Her goal is to expand her sales and services to other neighborhoods and approach part of the city of Barranquilla which is located quite close to where she lives and has her business.

Now she is applying for a loan from Kiva with which she will buy natural medicine, pollen propolis, sauces,menthol, soya,etc. Yillia has a goal of generating more income to help support her family much more.

loans.use: to buy natural medicine, bee pollen, propolis, sauces, menthol, soya, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase grafted cacao trees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase 1000 high yielding cacao trees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Piedrecita Group

texts.es: Angélica: Es la coordinadora del grupo solidario, tiene 38 años de edad, es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, madre soltera de 3 hijos, en edad escolar.  Con muchos esfuerzo desde hace 2 años estableció su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa nueva, calzado, venta de cosméticos por catálogos, en un local que alquila, pagando una mensualidad  de $ 100 (Cien dólares Netos). Solicita financiamiento para comprar mercadería en Managua: zapatos, pantalones de mujer, hombre, shorts, zapatos deportivos, blusas, ropa interior, cremas, perfumes y productos de belleza.  Su sueño es tener su propio tramo y apoyar en la educación profesional de sus hijos.
texts.en: Angélica is the coordinator of this loan group. She is 38 years old. She is a native of Puerto Cabezas and the single mother of three children of school age. Two years ago, with great effort, she established her little business of selling new clothing and shoes and selling cosmetics through catalogs in a space that she rents, paying a monthly fee of $100. She is applying for financing to buy merchandise in Managua: shoes, women's and men's pants, shorts, sport shoes, blouses, underwear, creams, perfumes, and beauty products. Her dream is to have her own section and to support the professional education of her children.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in Managua: shoes, women's and men's pants, shorts, sport shoes, blouses, underwear, creams, perfumes, and beauty products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his daughter's school expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Ariel

texts.en:
Ariel is 34 years old, married, and had a child. He is a farmer while his wife is a hog raiser. 

Ariel plants and harvests rice to sell. His wife also helps him with the business. 

He wants to enhance crop production, but he needs additional capital. So, he is now asking for a loan of 30,000 PHP to invest in buying farm inputs. He will buy fertilizers, herbicides, and insecticides to use in the rice field. 

These farm inputs will aid with better crop production and someday give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides, and insecticides.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a married mother of two children. Both children attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity, but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for her kids and food for her kids.

For the past three years, she has operated a business selling clothes. She sells door-to-door to her neighbors and passersby. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the 20,000 KES loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase two bales of clothes for resale. 

She decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase two bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Jumwa

texts.en:
Jumwa operates a stall selling groceries and vegetables. She sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. 

She appreciates the support of the previous loan that helped her to stock her business. 

With the 20,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. 

She decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman. She has four children, and all of them attend school. They live in their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She has operated a business selling fresh water for the past 10 years. She sells from home to her neighbors. Mariam faces a major challenge of seasonality. Sales are low during the rainy season. 

With the 50,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase a water tank and install a water tap for her business. 

Mariam dreams of expanding her business and establishing another business in the near future

loans.use: to purchase a water tank and install a water tap for her business

loans.name: Delfin Group

texts.es:
Este grupo está conformado por 3 amables y emprendedoras mujeres, que se integraron desde hace año y medio, con el propósito de acceder a financiamiento para comprar mercadería para su negocio y mejorar los ingresos del hogar.

Shorly Angélica: Es una mujer joven, amable, trabajadora, tiene 25 años de edad, madre soltera de un hijo de 2 años. Es la coordinadora del grupo. Con el objetivo de tener su propia fuente ingreso y mejor la calidad de vida de su familia estableció su pequeña pulpería desde hace 5 años, es un negocio que le heredo sus padres. Solicita financiamiento para comprar mercadería: chivería, granos básicos,  sopa instantánea, materiales de limpieza, cosméticos  entre otros. Su sueño es mejorar los ingresos de su negocio y tener un negocio de venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 3 friendly and enterprising women, who joined a year and a half ago, with the goal of accessing a loan to buy merchandise for their business and improve the income of the home.

Shorly Angélica: She is a young, friendly, hardworking woman of 25; a single mother with a 2 year old son. She is the coordinator of the group. With the goal of having her own source of income and to improve the quality of life of her family, she established her small grocery store 5 years ago. It is a business that her parents left her. She is asking for a loan to buy merchandise: yogurt, basic grains, instant soup, cleaning materials, cosmetics, among others. Her dream is to improve the revenues of her business and have a business selling new clothes.

loans.use: to buy merchandise: yogurt, basic grains, instant soup, cleaning materials, cosmetics, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine, fabric, and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: Bertha es soltera, no tiene hijos y vive en La Paz. Ella vive en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad Bertha es artesana y elabora balanzas de peso de material metalico y planchas Betha quiere un credito para comprar planchas y alambre de amarre Bertha no tiene a quien recurrir por eso pide la ayuda de Kiva
texts.en: Bertha is single, she doesn't have children and she lives in La Paz. She lives in a brick and cement house that is her property. Bertha is an artisan and makes weight scales from metallic material and metal plates. Bertha wants a loan to buy metal places and tie wire. Bertha does not have anyone to turn to; therefore, she is asking for help from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy metal plates and tie wire

loans.name: Paola

texts.es: Paola esta casada y tiene un hijo Ella vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde paga un alquiler Paola es consultora de belleza, vende televisores y trabaja en una entidad estatal Paola quiere un credito para abastecerse de mercaderia (televisores) Su esposo le ayuda pero contribuyendo a los gastos del hogar, Paola necesita un credito  para poder fortalecer su emprendimiento
texts.en: Paola is married and has a son. She lives in La Paz in a brick and cement house where she pays rent. Paola is a beauty consultant, sells televisions and works in a state entity. Paola wants a loan to stock merchandise (televisions). Her husband helps her by contributing to the expenses of the home. Paola needs a loan to be able to strengthen her enterprise.

loans.use: to stock merchandise (televisions)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his daughter's education.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La señora Josefina de 49 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus hijas  en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 5 años al negocio de venta de Rosquillas y Tamales, vive en una aldea de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras.
Doña Josefina es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Doña Josefina está solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos como maíz, cuajada, manteca, leña, papas, etc.  Con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo con deseos de trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Junio de 2014
texts.en:
Sra. Josefina is 49 years old and lives in her own home along with her husband and their daughters. For the past five years, she has managed a business of selling donuts and tamales. Josefina lives in a neighborhood in San Lorenzo, which is in southern Honduras.

Doña Josefina is an enterprising woman with the drive to get ahead and strive each day to improve her quality of life. She is requesting a loan in order to buy products such as corn, curds, lard, firewood, potatoes, and other supplies. With the support of this loan, she intends to improve her earnings as well as her quality of life. Josefina is a new client who has wanted to work with Prisma.

Her dreams include having a good business, increasing her clientele, and improving the future along with her family.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - June 2014

loans.use: to buy  corn, curds, lard, firewood, potatoes, and other supplies.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
La socia Lilian  se dedica al negocio de venta de cereales, la socia vende maiz,trigo y quinua, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cereales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar trigo, maíz y quinua.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Lilian makes a living selling grains. She sells corn, wheat and quinoa. She works from 8:00 am until 5:00 pm. She has been in this business for four years, and it it going very well for her. Her dream is to have her own location where she can sell the grains. 

Lilian is requesting a loan to buy wheat, corn and quinoa. She is excited for the loan and commits to make her repayments according to the agreement.

loans.use: to buy wheat, corn and quinoa.

loans.name: Raquel Eudocia

texts.es:
La socia Raquel se sigue dedicando al trabajo como odontologa,la socia tiene un consultorio donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este trabajo y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el trabajo como odontologa.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar una instrumentos de trabajo como una silla odontológica.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Raquel continues making a living working as a dentist. The member has a practice where she works from 8:00 AM until 6:00 PM. The member has already worked in this business for 5 years and it's going very well for her. The dream of the member is to grow her work as a dentist. The member is applying for the loan to buy a working instrument like a dental chair.

The member is happy because of the loan and is committed to fulfilling the payment of her installments.

loans.use: to buy working instruments like a dental chair.

loans.name: Abdul Rahim

texts.en: This is forty-one year-old Abdul Rahim. He is married and has four children aged four, six, ten and fifteen. He has one additional dependent who lives with him to improve her education. In 2007, Abdul Rahim established his used clothing business. He began this business just to be self-reliant after coming from the mines. His business is located at city center and his main customers are adults. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about 1,889,000 SLL every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of 6,250,000 SLL. Abdul Rahim has already received and successfully repaid 6 loans and now requires a new loan in order to buy blouses, skirts, jeans and t-shirts. He hopes that this loan will help him to increase the stock and expand the business. In the future, Abdul Rahim plans to expand to other areas of the town and educate the children. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for used clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an iron and new sewing machine

loans.name: José Carlos

texts.es:
José de 63 años de edad, es agricultor, estudio hasta segundo grado,  ya que sus padres no le tomaban la importancia debida a la educación y por esa razón dejó de estudiar, ahora está casado y junto a su pareja tienen 6 hijos, ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos y también le ayuda con la agricultura.

José se dedica y conoce de la agricultura desde hace 45 años, sus padres le enseñaron este trabajo para que se defendiera y le hiciera frente a la vida,  la agricultura es su  fuente de ingreso,  su esposa junto a sus hijos son quienes le ayudan mucho en este trabajo para salir adelante.

El crédito lo utilizará para comprar fertilizantes para su cosecha entre ellos están, veneno, y abono para obtener mejores resultados y ganancias para sustentar algunas necesidades básicas en su hogar. 

El sueño para el futuro que tiene  José es mejorar la vivienda en la que habitan, para tener una vida mejor, ya que su vivienda necesita algunas reparaciones en el techo y esto hace que se mojen en tiempos de lluvia.
texts.en:
José, 63, is a farmer. He studied until second grade since his parents didn't make it important due to education and, for this reason, he stopped studying. Now he is married and with his partner; they have 6 children. She dedicates herself to household chores and also helps him with the farming.

José has worked in and known agriculture for 45 years. His parents taught him this work so that he could defend himself and cope with life. Agriculture is his source of income. His wife, along with their children, are the ones who help him a lot in this work to get ahead.

He will use the loan to buy fertilizers for his harvest. Among them are pesticides and organic fertilizer to obtain better results and profits, to sustain some basic needs in his home.

The dream that José has for the future is to improve the home in which they live, to have a better life, since his home needs some repairs on the roof; it gets them wet during rainy times.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, among them organic fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Sifredo Ivan

texts.es:
Sifredo de 28 años de edad, está casado, tiene 2 hijos de 4 y 2 años, su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar y cuando tiene tiempo libre le ayuda con el trabajo de  la agricultura. Sifredo logró estudiar hasta quinto grado, y por la situacion economica en la que vivia le fue imposible continuar con el estudio. 

Sifredo desde muy pequeño empezó a trabajar en la agricultura, conoce muy bien esta actividad, ya que sus padres y sus hermanos mayores le enseñaron, cultiva el maíz, se levanta temprano para ir al campo para cuidar su cultivo y en los tiempos libres se dedica a comercializar mariscos.                            

El crédito que ha solicitado lo utilizará para comprar mas productos de mariscos y luego venderlos a un precio mayor para obtener ganancias y sustentar algunas necesidades en su hogar.

El sueño para un futuro es comprar un vehículo para hacer mas fácil la venta de pescado, sabe que con el podría trasladarse en todos los lugares de la comunidad, vendería mas, obtendría mas ganancias y por ende mejoraría su calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Sifredo, 28, is married, has 2 children, aged 4 and 2. His wife dedicates herself to the chores of the home and when she has time, she helps him with the farm work. Sifredo achieved studying until fifth grade, and because of the economic situation in which he lived, it was impossible to continue studying.

Since a very young age, Sifredo started working in agriculture. He knows this activity very well, since his parents and older siblings taught him. He grows corn - he wakes up early to go to the field to look after his crop and, in free time, he works selling shellfish.

The loan that he has applied for will be used to buy more shellfish products and sell them later at a higher price to obtain profits and sustain some needs in his home.

The dream for the future is to buy a vehicle to make the fish selling easier. He knows that he could get himself to all of the places in the community, he would sell more, he would obtain more revenue and, therefore, he would improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy shellfish in large quantities to sell them at retail later.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.en:
Emilia is fifty years old and married. She sells merchandise from her sari-sari, or grocery shop, to the people in her village.

Emilia is applying for a 17,000 PHP loan through ASKI to buy more soft drinks, canned goods, noodles, cookies and soap to sell. In this way she will maintain a good inventory and further improve her profits.

In order to be a responsible borrower Emilia also plans to allot part of her profits to paying back her loan. Her desire is to continue offering good products and service and make more in profits.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell

loans.name: Katherine Roxana

texts.es:
La socia Katherine Roxana se dedica al negocio de prestar servicios de publicidad a diferentes empresas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda donde pueda vender ropa. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar un televisor para su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Katherine Roxana provides publicity services to different businesses. She works from 8:00 a.m to 7:00 p.m. She's been doing this for several years and it's going well. Her dream is to have a clothing store.

She asks for a loan to buy a television for her home. The loan makes her happy and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy a television for her home.

loans.name: Jeferson

texts.es:
Jeferson es un hombre trabajador, tiene 29 años de edad, y vive en San Martin junto a su familia.
Tiene un hijo quien es su mayor orgullo y por quien día a día lucha para poder brindarle un futuro mejor. 
Desde hace 8 años se dedica a la agricultura, siendo el cacao el principal producto cultivado, desde hace poco está innovando con los cultivos de frijol y arroz. Le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, emprendedor y sobre todo porque siempre ofrece productos de calidad a un precio accesible.
Jeferson está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar insumos como fertilizantes para el abono de sus plantas, así como también invertirá en el mantenimiento hasta la etapa de la cosecha. De esta manera su producción mejorará y seguirá esforzándose para poder sacar adelante a su familia y convertirse en el mejor productor de cacao en la zona.
texts.en:
Jeferson is a hardworking 29 year old. He lives in San Martin with his family. He has one son, his pride and joy, for whom he fights every day for a better future. For 8 years he has worked as a farmer, primarily cultivating cacao. Recently he has been experimenting with beans and rice. It's going well because he is responsible, dedicated, and above all because he offers quality products at an accessible price.

Jeferson is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with their support he will be able to buy inputs like fertilizers for his plants, as well as to invest in maintenance until harvest season. This will improve his production and he will continue working hard to make a difference for his family and become the best cacao producer in the area.

loans.use: to maintain his crops by purchasing fertilizers.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 46 years old and lives with her husband, Teodoro, and children in Coron Palawan, Philippines. For the past twenty years she has made a good living running her sari-sari, which is basically a small convenience store. From it she sells groceries, toiletries and beverages that she has bought at wholesale prices. She then sells her goods piecemeal to the local neighborhood. Customers can buy one packet of shampoo, five PHPs-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. Gemma states she earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

Gemma’s family is one of those that were affected by super-typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines November 8, 2013. Despite the devastation she has managed to restart her business and is committed to regaining what the family lost. Overcoming this destruction has required additional effort in order to provide for her family's needs, especially for her children. She and her husband are working hard, though, determined to increase their income and provide their children with a good education.

Gemma is now applying for a 15,000 PHP loan through ASKI to buy additional merchandise to sell. She wants to rebuild her business quickly. She loves her children and dreams of giving them a quality education. She sincerely wishes to extend her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

All CCT community clients like Gemma are organized into fellowship groups of fifteen to thirty members who meet on a weekly basis. There they share stories of their work, repay microfinance loans and draw strength and inspiration from their study of the Word of God.

loans.use: to buy additional merchandise to sell.

loans.name: José Ricardo

texts.es:
José de 25 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer año de bachillerato, su esposa estudió hasta noveno grado, él se dedica a pastor en una iglesia evangélica.

José tiene 11 años de dedicarse a ser pastor evangélico en su comunidad, se siente muy bien trabajando en esto, ya  que se siente agradecido con Dios por tantas bendiciones que ha recibido de él y manifiesta que esto es lo que lo alienta a seguir luchando para fortalecimiento de su vida.

El crédito lo utilizará para comprar una motocicleta para trasladarse con facilidad a la iglesia donde se congrega.

El sueño de José es tener casa propia para vivir mas cómodos junto a su esposa y los hijos que vendrán en un futuro.
texts.en:
José, 25, studied until his third year of high school. His wife finished 9th grade. He has been the pastor of an evangelical church in his community for 11 years. He feels good about his work, and is grateful to God for so many blessings that he has received, and feels that this is what encourages him to keep fighting for strength in his life.

He will use the loan to buy a motorcycle to get to the church more easily. His dream is to own a home so that he and his wife and their future children can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to get to church easily.

loans.name: Mambu

texts.en:
Mambu is 44 years old and married without children. He also has an additional dependent living with the family whom Mambo helps by supporting this person’s education.

In 1996, after moving from his village Mambu established his business in Bo selling T-shirts, shorts, jeans, sneakers, shoes and shirts. His business is located in the city’s center where his main customers are adults. Working ten hours a day, seven days a week, he earns about 1,107,000 SLL every month.

Mambu is applying for a 5,000,000 SLL loan through ARD to buy additional jeans, belts and shirts to sell. He hopes this loan will help his business grow. In the future Mambu plans to buy some land and build a house. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy additional jeans, belts and shirts to sell.

loans.name: Karla Yesenia

texts.es: Karla de 33 años de edad vive solo con su hijo y su madre en casa propia, es una mujer luchadora y responsable para que a su familia no le falte lo necesario para la subsistencia. Actualmente trabaja vendiendo comida cerca de su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada desde hace varios años, tiene mucha clientela fija pues da a un buen precio el plato de comida, Karla desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar mesas, sillas, mas materia prima como: pollo, carne, verduras, arroz, frijoles, frutas, etc. y tener un poco de mas entrada económicamente, pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión, es por eso que solicita un crédito para comprar lo dicho; y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su hijo lo necesario sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Karla is 33 years old and lives in her own home along with her son and her mother. She is a determined and responsible woman who sees to it that her family is not lacking in whatever they need to survive. Karla currently works by selling food in a busy area near her home. She has been doing this for several years and has many established customers. Karla offers them a plate of food for a good price.

She wants to expand her stall by purchasing tables and chairs, as well as more supplies such as chicken, meat, vegetables, rice, beans, fruit, and other items. This will give her a bit of a financial start since she does not have sufficient resources to make this investment. For this reason, she is requesting a loan in order to buy these items. This will help her generate better earnings so that she can provide for her son’s needs without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, and various ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.en: Francisco is a married 50 year-old farmer planting and harvesting rice to sell. Francisco and his family live in Pataya. He uses his income to sustain the daily needs of the family, and also as revolving capital. Francisco aims for better crop production but he needs sufficient supply of farm inputs. So, he is asking for a loan of P30,000 to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and herbicides used in farming. In the future, he hopes to improve crop growth and development and achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and herbicide used in farming.

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma is fifty, married, and has five children aged twenty-three, twenty, thirteen, ten and eight. There are two additional dependents who live with him and help him in his business.

After dropping out of school Juma established his used tires and motor oil business in 1994. His business is located in the city’s center, and his main customers are adults. Working ten hours a day, seven days a week, he earns about 1,883,000 SLL every month.

Juma is applying for a 5,000,000 SLL loan in order to buy more used tires and motor oil to sell. He hopes this loan will help his business grow. In the future Juma plans to improve the business and expand into other areas of town. He wishes to thank you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more used tires and motor oil to sell.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
Aydee es soltera tiene una hija, vive en casa de su hermana la  misma se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella estudio solo hasta el nivel secundaria. Ella se dedica a la elaboracion de mantas de diferentes tipos de lana 

Necesita crédito para la compra de lana (moller) para poder hacer mayor numero de mantas y pueda cumplir con toda clase de requerimientos de parte de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Aydee is single and has a daughter. She lives at her sister’s house, which is located in the city of El Alto. Aydee only studied through high school. She makes blankets out of different types of wool.

Aydee needs a loan in order to buy wool so that she can produce a larger number of blankets. This will enable her to fulfill all of the various requests from her customers.

loans.use: to buy wool for making blankets.

loans.name: Nayra Andrea

texts.es:
La socia Nayra Andrea  se sigue dedica al trabajo como odontologa,la socia tiene un consultorio donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este trabajo y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el trabajo como odontologa.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar materiales odontologicas como instrumentos,resinas y amalgamas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member Nayra Andrea continues working as an orthodontist. She has an office where she works from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. She has been in this profession for 5 years and it is going very well. Her dream is to grow her business as an orthodontist. She requests a loan to buy orthodontic materials such as instruments, resin and amalgam. She is happy to receive the loan and promises to fulfill her payments.

loans.use: to buy orthodontic materials such as instruments, resin and amalgam.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La socia Yanet trabaja como profesoras,la socia enseña a sus alumnos desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y aceite.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member Yanet works as a teacher. She teaches her students from 8 a.m. until 2 p.m. She has several years of experience in this job and it is going very well. Her dream is to have a grocery store. She is requesting a loan to buy products of first necessity such as rice, sugar, milk and oil. She is happy to receive the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy products of first necessity such as rice, sugar, milk and oil

loans.name: Gustavo Antonio

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar, pero Gustavo es un hombre que nunca se ha rendido a pesar del clima o las circunstancias que puedan pasar, el siempre está dispuesto a conseguir los recursos para su familia.
Desde el momento en que fallecieron sus padres tuvo que tomar las riendas del negocio familiar que es una plantación de plátano en el municipio de Puerto Escondido.
Se levanta desde muy temprano para asistir sus cultivos y realizar el mantenimiento necesario a sus tierras.
Este oficio le ha permitido obtener los ingresos necesarios para salir adelante y darle un sustento digno a su familia.
El desea aumentar su producción y mejorar sus ingresos y es esta la razón que lo lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agropecuarios tales como fertilizante, riegos y pesticidas para aplicarlo a sus cultivos y garantizar su calidad.
texts.en:
Working in the field is one of the most difficult jobs due to the huge amount of effort required to progress, but Gustavo is a man who has never surrendered despite the weather or the circumstances that may pass. He is always willing to obtain resources for his family.

From the moment his parents passed away he had to take the reins of his family business, which is a banana plantation in the municipality of Puerto Escondido. He gets up very early to attend to his crops and to carry out the necessary maintenance of his lands. This job has allowed him to earn the necessary income to get ahead and provide his family with a dignified sustenance.

He wants to increase his production and improve his income, and this is the reason why he is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of farming supplies such as fertilizer, irrigation equipment and pesticides to apply to his crops and guarantee their quality.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Maria Berta

texts.es:
La señora María Berta de 48 años de edad, vive con su esposo en su casa  propia, se dedica desde hace 2 años al negocio de venta de Pasteles, sus clientes son personas de la zona y también de otras comunidades,  vive en una aldea de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras. 
Doña María Berta es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante que lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Doña María Berta está solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos como: azúcar, huevos, cajas, papel aluminio, harina, colorantes y etc.  Con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo con deseos de trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener una gran Repostería con varias empleadas  y poder mejorar su calidad de vida junto a su esposo y a su vez generar empleo a  otras personas. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras- Junio de 2014
texts.en:
Sra. María Berta is 48 years old and lives with her husband in their own home. For the past two years, she has been managing her business of selling cakes. Her customers include people from the area, as well as those who live in other communities. She lives in a neighborhood in San Lorenzo, which is in southern Honduras.

Doña María Berta is an enterprising woman who has drive to press forward each day so that she can improve her quality of life. She is requesting a loan in order to buy products such as sugar, eggs, boxes, aluminum foil, flour, food coloring, and other items. With the support of this loan, she intends to improve her earnings and also her quality of life. She is a new client who has wanted to work with Prisma.

Her dreams include having a large pastry shop with several employees, improving her quality of life along with her husband, and creating jobs for other people.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - June 2014

loans.use: to buy sugar, eggs, boxes, aluminum foil, flour, food coloring, and other items.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
Teófila es una mujer de 51 años de edad casada y sin hijos.
Ella se ocupa de vender pescado en la zona 16 de julio de la ciudad de El Alto, esta zona se caracteriza por el intenso frío y su altura a más de 4000 metros sobre el nivel del mar, el clima es cálido durante el día (8 grados centígrados/12 grados centígrados) y frío durante la noche (bajo cero grados centígrados). Durante los últimos meses de lluvia su domicilio se vio afectado por el agua y la humedad causando destrozos y goteras. 
Teófila lleva realizando su trabajo aproximadamente 18 años, es una vendedora de pescado conocida del lugar, tiene fieles clientes semanales. Ella es una mujer tradicional, lleva puesta ropa de pollera y sombrero, su piel es morena y su cabello negro como la noche, sus manos son arrugadas y secas como el clima del lugar. Ella tiene muchos sueños el principal es mejorar su calidad de vida, y tener un hogar caliente.
Es por esos motivos que Teófila solicita un préstamo para la refacción de su vivienda y cumplir su sueño de vivir en un hogar caliente.
texts.en:
Teófila is a 51-year-old woman who is married without children. She makes a living selling fish in the 16 de Julio district in the city of El Alto. This area is characterized by intense cold and an altitude of more than 4,000 meters above sea level. The climate is warm during the day (8 degrees Celsius / 12 degrees Celsius) and cold during the night (below zero degrees Celsius). In the recent rainy months her home has been affected by the water and moisture, causing damage and leaks. 

Teófila has been doing her job for about 18 years. She is well known as a fish seller in the area, and has loyal weekly customers. She is a traditional woman, who wears a pollera [traditional Bolivian attire] and sombrero. Her skin is dark and her hair as black as night; her hands are wrinkled and dry like the zone's climate.

She has many dreams, of which the principal one is to improve her quality of life, and to have a warm home. For these reasons Teófila is requesting a loan for the renovation of her house and to fulfill her dream of living in a warm house.

loans.use: to renovate her home so she can fulfill her dream of living in a warm house

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: Rene es soltero, no tiene hijos y vive con sus padres en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a su familia Rene se gana la vida como policia, pero recién ha empezado su carrera por lo que necesita un credito para comprar una computadora para poder hacer cursos de actualización  y terminar sus estudios Rene recibe la ayuda de sus padres pero eso no es suficiente por eso necesita su colaboración
texts.en: Rene is single, without children and lives with his parents in El Alto in a house of brick and cement which belongs to his family. Rene makes a living as a police officer, but recently he started his university degree for which he needs a loan to buy a computer so he can take training courses and finish his studies. Rene receives help from his parents but it is not sufficient and for this reason he needs additional support.

loans.use: to buy a computer so he can take training courses and finish his studies

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en: This is 50- year-old Mariama.  She is married and has 4 children aged thirty-four, thirty, twenty-five, and twenty-two. In 1993, Mariama established her ladies slippers and sandals business. She took the business as her profession as she is not educated and she saw it fit for her living. Her business is located in the city center and her main customers are ladies. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,850,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Mariama requires a loan in order to buy ladies slippers and sandals. She hopes that this loan will expand her business. In the future, Mariama plans to raise more capital to enable her to travel to different West Africa countries to get more valuable goods. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for ladies slippers and sandals.

loans.name: Mercedes Susana

texts.es:
Mercedes es una agricultora de nacimiento criada y formada con los valores firmes de las familias campesinas que son la humildad y el trabajo duro, siendo estos dos los más representativos de los agricultores en todo el mundo. Mercedes, no conforme con los ingresos que obtenía como agricultora decidió montar una tienda hace 4 años para complementar su actividad y aumentar sus ingresos ya que éstos no le alcanzaban para cubrir todos los gastos de sus hogar y sostenimiento de sus hijos. 
Es por esta razón que la señora Mercedes solicita un apoyo económico para la compra de abarrotes y víveres para surtir su tienda, los cuales complementarían muy bien los ya conocidos productos que distribuye y que incluso vende lo que cultiva en un pequeño sembradío de ñame. 
Su sueño es poder trabajar constantemente y ver crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Mercedes was born and raised with the solid values of a rural agricultural family. These values are humility and hard work, the two which are most representative of farmers everywhere. 

Mercedes, unsatisfied with her income from farming, decided to open a store 4 years ago to complement her work and increase her income, since her earnings were not sufficient to cover all of the household expenses and the sustenance of her children. For this reason, Mercedes requests economic assistance to buy groceries and provisions to stock her store. These would complement very well the products which she is already known to distribute, including her own produce from a small patch of yams. 

Her dream is to be able to work constantly and to see her business grow.

loans.use: to buy groceries and provisions for her store

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato y se casó su esposa se dedica al comercio de materiales plásticos, tienen tres hijos y están estudiando viven en la casa con ella y también vive la mamá de José.

Él es empleado del órgano judicial desempeñándose en el área  de encargado de los fondos arancelarios, tiene ocho años en este trabajo, los fines de semana se dedica también al negocio de la venta de plásticos junto a su esposa, el negocio está a 4 km de su vivienda.


El crédito lo necesita para comprar repuestos para el vehículo en donde transporta la mercadería (vasos, platos, tenedores, guacales de plástico, etc.) al lugar donde tiene el negocio también para comprar más productos.

Para su negocio su sueño es que aun futuro sea más grande,  que genere mejores ingresos para darles a sus hijos el estudio y que en un futuro sean profesionales, y darle una mejor calidad de vida  a su familia.
texts.en:
José is 40 years old and studied through high school. He is married and his wife sells plastic materials. They have three children who are studying and living at home. In addition, José’s mother also lives with them.

José is an employee of the judicial branch and works in the department that is in charge of handling tariff funds. He has been in this job for eight years. On the weekends, he also sells plastics with his wife. The business is located four kilometers from their house.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy spare parts for the vehicle that he uses to transport merchandise (cups, plates, forks, plastic crates, and other items) to his place of business. He will also buy more products. José dreams that this business will get larger so that he can generate more income for his children’s studies in order that they can become professionals in the future. He also wants to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his work vehicle and more plastic goods to sell.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana es soltera pero tiene dos hijos  Ella vive en El Alto  en una casa de adobe junto a sus familiares. Juana es costurera ella es bastante experimentada y quiere un credito para comprar una nueva maquina de cocer  Juana es la unica fuente de sustento en el hogar el padre de los hijos no quiso asumir responsabilidad Por eso Juana necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Juana is single and has two children. She lives with her family members in an adobe house located in El Alto.

Juana is a seamstress with sufficient experience. She wants to acquire a loan in order to buy a new sewing machine. Juana is the only breadwinner in her household since the father of her children does not want to assume responsibility. For this reason, Juana is in need of assistance.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Damas Triunfadoras - Callao Group

texts.es: Alejandro de 18 años de edad pertenece al grupo  Damas Triunfadoras. Es soltero estudiante en la universidad y vive con su familia (hermanos y padres), se dedica al lavado de autos desde hace dos  años, trabaja solo tres veces por semana y atiende aproximadamente diez clientes al día. Solicito el préstamo para invertir en su negocio de lavado y se siente feliz y agradecido con los inversionistas de KIVA por la ayuda que lo hace sentir muy entusiasmado y agradece por la confianza; comprará franelas, detergentes, escobillones, mangueras y otros implementos. Ahora se siente con muchas ganas de seguir adelante y el tiene como objetivo formar su propia empresa y darle el apoyo a su familia y darse una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 18 years old and belongs to the group Damas Triunfadoras [Triumphant Women]. He is a single student studying in the university and lives with his family (siblings and parents). 

He has been making a living washing cars for two years. He works only three times a week and attends to approximately ten customers per day. He requested the loan to invest in his car-washing business and is happy and grateful to Kiva lenders for their help, which makes him feel very enthusiastic and grateful for their trust. 

He will buy dusters, swabs, detergent, hoses and other implements. Presently he has a strong desire to get ahead and his objective is to form his own business and help his family attain a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy hoses, detergents, dusters and silicone for their business

loans.name: Los Amigos Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS AMIGOS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Paucartambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Paucartambo y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marcela ella es casada y tiene 33 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de cereales, la socia vende maiz, trigo y quinua, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cereales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar maíz, trigo y quinua.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de agricultura, negocio de venta de cereales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "LOS AMIGOS." This bank is located in the district of Paucartambo, which belongs to the province of Paucartambo and department of Cusco. 

The member is Marcela and she is married, 33 years old with 2 children. She works in her business selling grains. She sells corn, wheat and quinoa, and works from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. She has had this business for 4 years and it is going very well. Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell her grains. She requests the loan to buy corn, wheat and quinoa. 

The other members work in agriculture, grain sales, a grocery store, and a business selling animals. The member is grateful to those who are helping her achieve her dream and promises to make her payments in the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy corn, wheat and quinoa.

loans.name: Eliecer

texts.es: La venta de ropa y el servicio de lavadoras  son los dos negocios que realiza Eliecer para generar ingresos desde hace 4 años. Su negocio inició por iniciativa propia, cuando cansado de no encontrar un trabajo para emplearse,  decidió generar ingresos autónomos para su sostenimiento. Día a día con el servicio de calidad que ofrece a su clientela, ubicada en el barrio donde habita y en sus alrededores,  impacta la potencialidad de ellos, pero necesita mejorar su infraestructura de trabajo y por eso tiene como meta mas adelante comprar un lote para organizar un local donde pueda ser mas efectivo y competitivo. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la fundación Mario santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará repuestos para actualizar sus lavadora y ropa que tiene encargada. Con esta inversión, prestará a su clientela un mejor servicio, ganará un poco mas de clientes y de dinero que le servirán para ayudar a sus padres como es su mayor ambición.
texts.en:
The sale of clothing and servicing of washing machines are the two businesses that Eliecer has been running for 4 years to generate income. He started his business through his own initiative; when he was tired of not being able to find a job, he decided to earn income independently for his sustenance.

Day by day, with the quality service he offers to his clientele, who are located in hid neighborhood and the surrounding areas, he impacts their potential. However, he needs to improve his work infrastructure and for this reason has a goal of buying a lot in the future to set up a locale where he can be more effective and competitive.

Currently he is applying for a Kiva loan, the first financing he is getting from the foundation Mario Santo Domingo, which he will use to buy supplies to update the washing machines and clothing which he is in charge of. With this investment, he will provide his customers with better service, he will earn a few more customers and money which will allow him to help his parents, which is his greatest ambition.

loans.use: to buy supplies to update the washing machines and clothing which he is in charge of

loans.name: Nilota

texts.en:
Nilota is from Maynaguri.  She is 37 years old and married to Dhiren. Together they are raising three children (two sons and one daughter).  Two of them are students who read in grade three and grade eight, respectively. The third one is too young.  Nilota and her husband are both uneducated and can only sign their names. They live in their own house in the small village of Petkati in the district of Jalpaiguri.

The family owns a plot of land and Nilota's husband grows vegetables, mainly potatoes.  To earn additional income, Nilota is also engaged in a small business making incense sticks.  She purchases the raw materials and makes incense sticks in her house.  Her main clients are her neighbors.  She works tirelessly on her business, after managing her household.  In a rural area where they live, all these efforts of Nilota and her husband provide them with a meager income to run the family well.  But she sees the potential in her business as it is in high demand in her locality and they are facing a growing demand.

So she is seeking a loan from Kiva's partner BJS.  She wants to use the loan to purchase raw materials required for making incense to add her inventory. The loan will help her increase her sales and therefore, their income and savings, helping her access an improved standard of living.  She wants to provide her children with better educational support so that they can study well.

She gives her thanks to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials to make incense

loans.name: Vairanenjam Shg - Kovilseemai Group

texts.en:
Usha is a 45-year-old lady residing in Kovilseemai, a small village in Tamil Nadu, India. She has two children.  Usha is the leader of the “Vairanenjam” Self-Help Group (SHG) with 15 other women. The group has been receiving loans from the local NGO “People’s Action for Transformation” (PAT) for the last five years.

Usha and her group are requesting a loan to purchase a Greenway smart smokeless stove. The stove is a single burner, highly efficient cook stove designed for long-term, everyday use. The stove can use any type of solid biomass fuel including wood, cow dung and agricultural waste. It also produces 70% less smoke while using 65% less fuel than traditional mud cook stoves. Usha and her group have the opportunity to save time and cut a recurring fuel expense all the while being able to cook in a healthier environment. This stove has also been tested and certified by the Ministry of New & Renewable Energy (MNRE), Government of India.

loans.use: to purchase a smokeless stove

loans.name: Sukha

texts.en:
Sukha is a housewife and a mother of three children (one son and two daughters). Sukha hails from Maynaguri.  She is married to Pradip, who is 38 years old and a cycle-van puller by profession.  Both are uneducated and can only sign their names. Their children are receiving an education and are in grades 9, 6, and 5. They live in their own kachha house (a house made of mud, wood and straw) in Khagrabari in Jalpaiguri district.

Sukha's husband is a rickshaw puller, who carries people from one place to another in his village.  In this way, he earns for the family.  He has no rickshaw of his own, so he works on a rented rickshaw.  He has no permanent income. It is very difficult for him to maintain the entire household and the educational costs of the children with his meager income. Sukha and her husband thought it over and have decided to take a loan to purchase a new cycle rickshaw so that her husband can easily earn more income and not have to pay any rent.

So, Sukha applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s husband) to purchase a cycle rickshaw.  They hope that the business will be profitable for them because people use a rickshaw for transportation purposes to cover short distances.

Sukha's dream is to make her family economically strong with earnings from the business.

She and her husband give their hearty thanks to both BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a rickshaw for her husband

loans.name: Wilmer Enrique

texts.es: A sus 19 años Wilmer desarrolla varias actividades comerciales que le permiten generar ingresos, por un lado vende mercancía variada, indistintamente entre clientes que se la encargan y el les ofrece créditos. Por otro lado tiene un punto comercial tipo miscelánea donde vende de contado papelería, dulcería y accesorios y finalmente prepara frituras y las ofrece entre su misma clientela y todo esto lo hace con el fin de ganar dineros para sostenerse. El aprendió con su tia quien vendia chichas entre sus vecinas y Wilmer le ayudaba mientras ella le pagaba por las tareas en las que la apoyaba. Poco a apoco fue ahorrando  y logró comprar poco a poco accesorios femeninos y productos que su clientela le pedía. Hoy su necesidad de crecimiento no se detiene y por eso acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  pues necesita dinero para invertir y vender a un mas ropa, calzado, fritos y refrescos, con esta inversión poco a poco y mas adelante  cumplirá con su meta,  de convertir su negocio en un almacén y lograr estudios profesionales para avanzar en la vida. Todo esto es lo que hace de su credikiva una buena inversión.
texts.en:
Wilmer, 19, carries out various commercial activities to earn an income.  On the one hand he sells different merchandise to customers who place orders and he extends credit to them.  On the other hand he has a stall where he sells all kinds of goods such as stationery items, sweets and accessories.  And, finally, he prepares and sells fried foods to the same clientele in an effort to earn enough money to support himself.

He learned his trade beside his aunt who sold corn drinks to neighbors.  Wilmer helped her and she paid him for the work he did.  Little by little he was able to save and start buying women's accessories and the products his customers wanted.  Now his need for development is ever increasing so he is asking for his first CrediKiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation.  He needs money to buy more clothing, shoes, fried foods and soft drinks.

With this investment he will be able to meet his goal in the future, little by little, which is to turn his business into a large store and to get professional training to advance in life.  This will make his CrediKiva loan a good investment.

loans.use: To buy clothing, shoes, fried foods and soft drinks.

loans.name: Gbessay

texts.en: This is thirty-five year-old Gbessay. He is married and has two children aged two and eight. He has one additional dependent who lives with him assisting her with her education. In 2010, Gbessay established his stationery, printing and soft drinks business. He began this business just to add to his income as a lecturer. His business is located in the outskirts and his main customers are adults. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about SLL 1,020,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 4,000,000. Gbessay has already received and successfully repaid two loans and now requires a new loan in order to buy A4 paper, toner and drinks. He hopes that this loan will help him to increase his stock and expand the business. In the future, Gbessay plans to be able to complete the construction of his house. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for stationery

loans.name: Froilan

texts.es: Froilan esta casado y tiene 6 hijos Vive en la comunidad de Tihuanacu en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad Froilan es productor lechero y cria ganado Desarrolla su actividad desde las cuatro de la mañana Froilan quiere un credito para compra de alimento de ganado  y un molino para el agua Froilan recibe apoyo de su familia pero  eso no es suficiente para su emprendimiento Se recomienda ayudarle
texts.en:
Froilan is married and has six children.  He lives in the community of Tihuanacu in a brick and cement house that he owns.  Froilan is a milk producer and raises cattle, and begins his daily routine at 4:00 a.m.  He wants to buy feed for his cattle and a watermill.

Froilan receives help from his family but it is not enough for his business, so he is in need of support.

loans.use: To buy feed for his cattle and a watermill.

loans.name: Runa

texts.en:
Runa is a young woman of 23 years from Maynaguri.  She is married and a mother of two lovely daughters at this tender age. She lives with her husband and daughters in the small village of Subhas Pally in the district of Jalpaiguri. She and her husband Hakim both studied up to grade seven.  Their daughters are too young for school.

Her husband has a small plot of land and grows different vegetables such as gourds, beans, eggplant and other seasonal vegetables.  His income is barely enough for the living expenses of his family.
